jcr:content.jcr:title: POWERPLAY - Crush
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech PowerPlay wireless charging system charges your Logitech G wireless gaming mouse during gameplay. Forget your battery-life & Focus on playing.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G PowerPlay Wireless Charging System

product_banner.altText: Accolades: Pop Sci Best of What's New, CES Innovation Award

testimonial.quotation: “POWERPLAY technology has made me a wireless believer. I might never go back.”

testimonial_copy.quotation: “No docking, no battery swaps—just scrollin’ scrollin’ scrollin.”

testimonial_copy_633059786.quotation: "Once I was up and running, the combination of LIGHTSPEED and POWERPLAY made for a revolutionary mousing experience."

copyblock.mainDescription: With POWERPLAY and LIGHTSPEED technology integrated, Logitech G has solved the barriers to high performance wireless gaming. Input lag, wireless drops and dead batteries are now a thing of the past. Wireless is the future of PC gaming, made possible through advanced science and unrivaled engineering.
POWERPLAY provides endless play by keeping your compatible Logitech G mouse charged at all times, even while you game.

media_tile.text: Through innovative application of electromagnetic resonance, the POWERPLAY base creates an energy field above its surface. This allows charging at all times over a large surface area.

media_tile_copy.text: The POWERPLAY energy field is transformed into charging current by the POWERCORE module, which attaches magnetically to compatible wireless gaming mice. Just snap it in and play. We’ve made it that simple. So, group up fearlessly, grind ranks, raid to your heart’s content, and repeat—ad infinitum.

media_tile_copy_1282002099.text: The POWERPLAY charging current and integrated LIGHTSPEED wireless receiver are both powered with one cable. This puts the LIGHTSPEED connection right next to your mouse for the fastest and most reliable connection and eliminates the need for an additional USB port for the wireless receiver.

copyblock.mainDescription: Logitech G invented LIGHTSPEED wireless technology to deliver the ultimate in high-performance wireless gaming.

media_tile.text: LIGHTSPEED wireless technology is as fast or faster than many wired gaming mice. And that was the required benchmark for LIGHTSPEED viability. The only satisfactory result is the total freedom of wireless with absolutely no compromises.

media_tile_copy.text:
Logitech G engineers worked through a complete end-to-end technology optimization from sensor to firmware, circuitry to antenna. We tested and refined each component, focusing on the slowest link until nothing was slow.

  1. SPI: Sensor peripheral interface is highly optimized for maximum processing speed and efficiency.

  2. MCU: Microcontroller unit translates data from the processor, via enhanced firmware, faster than ever before.

  3. RFIC: Radio frequency integrated circuit transmits MCU data robustly and reliably via fine-tuned electrical pathways.

  4. RF antenna is designed specifically for LIGHTSPEED for absolute minimum impedance and maximum signal strength.

  5. Nano receiver connects discretely via USB and is fully capable of transmitting at a report rate of  1,000 Hz (1 ms) to the PC.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: The included POWERCORE module enables compatible wireless mice for POWERPLAY. It works with the G903, G703 and PRO wireless gaming mice. Easily swap in the magnetic POWERCORE module and you’re ready to wirelessly charge.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: The included POWERCORE module enables compatible wireless mice for POWERPLAY. It works with the G903, G703 and PRO wireless gaming mice. Easily swap in the magnetic POWERCORE module and you’re ready to wirelessly charge.

copyblock.mainDescription: The G logo lights up in brilliant LIGHTSYNC RGB color that responds to in-game action in many titles. Use Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) and set your lighting color and animations with up to 16.8 million colors. You can even synchronize lighting effects with Logitech G keyboards, speakers, and headsets for a unified look and feel.

player_quote.playerQuotation: Using a LIGHTSPEED wireless mouse keeps me free from cables and confident that I have the gear that is going deliver pure performance to help me win

copyblock.mainDescription: Tune your performance to your mouse pad of choice. We include both our cloth and hard surfaces so you can customize and swap interchangeably. POWERPLAY will suit your style right out of the box.
copyblock.mainTitle: Cloth and Hard Gaming Mouse Pads

item1.text: Windows® 7 or later, macOS® X 10.10 or later

item3.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software
